## ðŸ’¼ Business News - 2025-11-15

### Top Stories

1. [Trump rolls back tariffs on key imports, citing price relief for U.S. families and businesses](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/trump-rolls-back-tariffs-key-imports-citing-price-relief-u-s-families-businesses)

2. [Amazon robotics chief: â€˜I want to eliminate every menial, mundane jobâ€™ as AI reshapes warehouse work](https://www.foxbusiness.com/technology/amazon-robotics-chief-wants-eliminate-every-menial-mundane-job-company-within-years-warehouse-work)

3. [Redfin teams up with Sierra to revolutionize homebuying with new conversational search tool](https://www.foxbusiness.com/media/redfin-teams-up-sierra-ai-revolutionize-homebuying-new-conversational-search-tool)

4. [Flight restrictions slashed at 40 major US airports as government reopens, staffing improves](https://www.foxbusiness.com/money/flight-restrictions-slashed-40-major-us-airports-government-reopens-staffing-improves)

5. [LARRY KUDLOW: Why are Gen Z-ers so dour, depressed, and unemployed?](https://www.foxbusiness.com/politics/larry-kudlow-why-gen-z-ers-so-dour-depressed-unemployed)

6. [Stephen Curry, Under Armour part ways so NBA superstar can focus on independent brand](https://www.foxbusiness.com/sports/stephen-curry-under-armour-part-ways-so-nba-superstar-can-focus-independent-brand)

7. [Bitcoinâ€™s bear market week](https://www.foxbusiness.com/markets/bitcoins-bear-market-week)

8. [US crude oil stockpiles rise as production hits record](https://www.foxbusiness.com/energy/us-crude-oil-stockpiles-rise-production-hits-record)

9. [Trump axes Biden plan that would have forced airlines to pay passengers cash for delays](https://www.foxbusiness.com/fox-news-air-space/trump-axes-biden-plan-would-have-forced-airlines-pay-passengers-cash-delays)

10. [Toyota recalls about 127K pickup trucks, SUVs over potential engine issues](https://www.foxbusiness.com/lifestyle/toyota-recalls-about-127k-pickup-trucks-suvs-over-potential-engine-issues)

### Summary

1. The Trump administration has reduced tariffs on essential imports, aiming to alleviate financial pressures on American households and companies.
2. Amazon's head of robotics expresses a desire to automate all repetitive and uninteresting jobs, highlighting the transformative impact of AI on warehouse operations.
3. Redfin collaborates with Sierra to introduce an innovative conversational search tool, aiming to significantly enhance the homebuying process.
4. The U.S. government has lifted flight restrictions at 40 major airports, attributed to the reopening of the government and improved staffing conditions.
5. Larry Kudlow discusses the concerning trends of pessimism, depression, and unemployment among Generation Z, questioning the underlying causes.

## ðŸ’» Tech News - 2025-11-15

### Top Stories

1. [A New York film festival canceled due to Chinese authorities pressure](https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/new-york-film-festival-canceled-chinese-pressure-rcna243943)

2. [The first of 30 Bob Ross works were auctioned for public TV: They broke records](https://www.npr.org/2025/10/08/nx-s1-5566744/bob-ross-paintings-auction-public-media)

3. [Seven killed, 27 injured in explosion at police station in India's Kashmir](https://www.rnz.co.nz/news/world/578961/seven-killed-27-injured-in-explosion-at-police-station-in-india-s-kashmir-ndtv-reports)

4. [VisiData â€“ open-source spreadsheet for the terminal](https://www.visidata.org/)

5. [Show HN: BranchBox â€“ isolated dev environments per feature](https://github.com/branchbox/branchbox)

6. [Review of Spreadsheet User Interfaces](https://www.vogt.world/review-of-spreadsheet-user-interfaces/)

7. [Zig GUI from Scratch](https://www.vogt.world/zig-gui-from-scratch-part-1/)

8. [Find and share the best Black Friday deals](https://rewardkitty.com/)

9. [Show HN: Instagram Saved Posts Exporter](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/instagram-saved-posts-exp/opgclnehegaekpalmclkdaomgljpbadp)

10. [Starlight Spotlight: A Hospital Wii in a New Light](https://dolphin-emu.org/blog/2025/11/14/starlight-spotlight/)

### Summary

1. A New York film festival was canceled following pressure from Chinese authorities, highlighting the influence of political factors on international cultural events.
2. The auction of Bob Ross's artworks for public TV not only shattered records but also underscored the enduring popularity and financial value of the beloved painter's works.
3. A devastating explosion at a police station in India's Kashmir resulted in significant casualties, underscoring ongoing security challenges in the region.
4. VisiData, an open-source spreadsheet designed for terminal use, represents a significant development in data analysis tools, offering a powerful alternative for tech professionals.
5. BranchBox introduced isolated development environments for each feature, showcasing an innovative approach to software development that enhances efficiency and collaboration among developers.
